description: This meta shows you how to create bulk virtual nubans

spec.accounts: This is the number of virtual nubans you want to Generate
spec.email: This could be a generic email address
spec.is_permanent: This allows you create a static account number i.e. it doesn't expire
spec.duration: This is represented in days e.g. passing 2 means 2 days. It is the expiry date for the account number.
spec.frequency: This is the number of times a generated account number can receive payments.
spec.tx_ref: This is a transaction reference that would be returned each time a transfer is done to the account.
spec.amount: The desired amount to be collected
